mapper.select: SELECT c.cart_id, c.member_id, c.product_id, c.quantity, p.name AS productName, p.thumbnail_url AS imageUrl, p.price FROM cart c JOIN product p ON c.product_id = p.product_id WHERE c.member_id = #{memberId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO cart (member_id, product_id, quantity) VALUES (#{memberId}, #{productId}, #{quantity})
